name: Wills and Wonders
description: Wills and Wonders is a turn based strategy game in a fantasy setting. Wills and Wonders brings you on an adventure through Earth's mythology as you embark on quests to capture creatures, find skills, and recruit new leaders. Build armies, take land, and assert your dominance over all of Midgard.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 550 Ti DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Touchscreen approved.
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Quad Core 2.66 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 Ti DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Touchscreen approved.
